data.title: Travel Yekaterinburg Itinerary:5 days Must
meta_keywords: What to do in Yekaterinburg in 5 Days
Best Things to Do in Yekaterinburg
data.meta_description: Let’s discover helpful tips about where to stay, things to do, and food guides in Yekaterinburg. Click on Trip.com to find deals for the best things to do in Yekaterinburg in 5 days.
data.text:
Day 1 | Morning

Sverdlovskiy Oblastnoy Krayevedcheskiy Muzey

Opening Hours: Open on Wed-Sun,11:00am-6:00pm

Ticket Price: 80 RUB

Recommended Length of Stay: 1.0-2.0 Hours

Location: Prospekt Lenina, 69/10, Yekaterinburg, Sverdlovskaya oblast', Russia, 620075

The museum is based on the collection of specimens by the Ural Nature Lovers Association. Over time, more and more things are collected here, most of which are related to local history, human customs, biology, landforms, etc., so it is also here. turned into a local history museum. Everything about the Urals is presented here, the most popular being the exhibition of the last Tsar Nicholas II.

Day 1 | Afternoon

After finishing the tour at Sverdlovskiy Oblastnoy Krayevedcheskiy Muzey, you can head to Church on Blood in Honour of All Saints Resplendent in the Russian Land, the most worth visiting place around the corner.

Church on Blood in Honour of All Saints Resplendent in the Russian Land

Ticket Price: Free

Recommended Length of Stay: 1.0-2.0 Hours

Location: Ulitsa Tsarskaya, 10, Yekaterinburg, Sverdlovskaya oblast', Russia, 620075

Located in the downtown area. In 1918, the Bolsheviks who hurriedly evacuated Yekaterinburg during the civil war killed the last czar's family. In 2003, the Cathedral of Spilled Blood was built here. The church is large in scale, and the group of bronze statues on the front shows the scene of the tsar's family going to the basement to meet their own death. There are photos of the last Tsar Nicholas and things used in his lifetime. The basement floor is a prayer room similar to an Orthodox church, and sometimes there are hymns sung here.

Day 1 | Evening

For convenient access to more popular attractions, Visotsky Hotel is the best places.

Visotsky Hotel

Vysotsky Hotel is located on the 39th floor of a business centre in Yekaterinburg, within a 15-minute walk of Ploshchad 1905 Goda Metro Station. Wi-Fi access in all areas and private on-site parking are available free of charge.The luxurious air-conditioned rooms feature a minibar and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.The hotel’s à la carte restaurant serves dishes of European and Japanese cuisine and the bar offers a variety of drinks.At Vysotsky Hotel you can visit a nightclub and play billiards or bowling with friends. After a busy day, guests can relax in the hotel’s sauna or visit the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool.Yuzhny Bus Station is 4 km away and Yekaterinburg Train Station is within a 15-minute walk. Koltsovo International Airport is 18 km away.

Day 2 | Morning

Yekaterinburgskiy Muzey Izobrazitel'nykh Iskusstv

Opening Hours: Open on Thu-Fri,Sun,11:00am-7:00pm;Open on Mon-Wed,11:00am-8:00pm

Recommended Length of Stay: 2.0-3.0 Hours

Location: Europe.Russia.Urals.Yekaterinburg

The museum mainly displays jewelry from the sixteenth to nineteenth centuries, in addition to oil paintings, ornaments, sculptures, architecture and other exhibits.

Day 2 | Afternoon

Now we come to another great highlight in the city: Monastery of Saint Regal Martyrs.

Monastery of Saint Regal Martyrs

Opening Hours: Open from 10:30am-5:00pm

Location: GANINA YAMA

Located on the outskirts of Yekaterinburg, the scenery is very beautiful, with green light wooden structure buildings.

Day 2 | Evening

If you want to explore other popular attractions later, Wedding Palace is a suitable place for you to stay and refresh.

Wedding Palace

Located in Yekaterinburg, Wedding Palace is a 4-minute drive from Igra Chamber Youth Theater and 5 minutes from Upper Isets Metallurgy Plant History Museum. This hotel is 3.4 mi (5.5 km) from Provincial Dance Theater and 3.5 mi (5.7 km) from Upper Iset Centre of Culture. Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services. This hotel also features tour/ticket assistance, barbecue grills, and a ballroom. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary continental breakfast is included. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 23 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Day 3 | Morning

Monument to a Keyboard

Recommended Length of Stay: 0.5-2.0 Hours

Location: Ulitsa Gor'kogo, Yekaterinburg, Sverdlovskaya oblast', Russia, 620075

This is a creative new attraction, located in Yekaterinburg, built in 2005, in the shape of a classic keyboard.

Day 3 | Afternoon

When time permits after visiting Monument to a Keyboard, don’t forget pay a visit to Yekaterinburg State Academical Opera and Ballet Theatre.

Yekaterinburg State Academical Opera and Ballet Theatre

Recommended Length of Stay: 1.0-2.0 Hours

Location: Lenina Ave., 46A | Metro Pervomayskaya, Yekaterinburg 620075, Russia

It's a theatre in Yekaterinburg with a museum of classic operas and a great place for people to watch ballet.

Day 3 | Evening

If you want to explore other popular attractions later, Atrium Palace Hotel is a suitable place for you to stay and refresh.

Atrium Palace Hotel

A stay at Atrium Palace Hotel places you in the heart of Yekaterinburg, steps from Germany Consulate General and 3 minutes by foot from World Trade Center. This 5-star hotel is 0.2 mi (0.4 km) from Holy Trinity Cathedral and 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Monument "the Invisible Man". Enjoy recreational amenities such as a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon. Stop by the hotel's restaurant, La Ronde Restaurant, for lunch or dinner. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Yekaterinburg? This hotel has 2045 square feet (190 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service. Make yourself at home in one of the 131 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Day 4 | Morning

Passage

Recommended Length of Stay: 1.0-2.0 Hours

Location: Russia, Yekaterinburg, Vainera St., 9,

Passage is a high-end shopping mall in Yekaterinburg, beautifully decorated, with all kinds of goods, is popular place.

Day 4 | Afternoon

Ural Vision Gallery nearby is the top choice before you leave Passage and hit the road.

Ural Vision Gallery

Recommended Length of Stay: 1.0-2.0 Hours

Location: Sheinkmana, 10, Yekaterinburg 620014, Russia

This is a beautiful gallery, mainly displaying contemporary artists' works, exhibits rich, colorful, is a good place for art lovers.

Day 4 | Evening

If you want to explore other popular attractions later, Atlaza City Residence is a suitable place for you to stay and refresh.

Atlaza City Residence

Located in Yekaterinburg (Oktyabrskiy rayon), ATLAZA City Residence is within a 15-minute walk of Mayakovsky Central Park of Culture and Rest and Pavlik Morozov Park. This 4-star hotel is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Galerka Youth Theater-Studio and 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from Yekaterinburg Zoo. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a sauna, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of ATLAZA City Residence, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
